import React from 'react' import {Formik, Form, Field} from 'formik' import {authAPI} from '../../../api' const initialValues = { email: '' } export const forgotPassword = (props) => { const onSubmit = (body) => { authAPI.forgot_password(body.email) props.forgotpassword() } return(

Forgot password?

For Manufactures

 Don't have an account? Sing up!
) }
